summary.span: 提供支援建立和執行階段存取之外掛程式序列化程式的類型，可讀取和寫入不同資料格式的文件。

span.span: Provides types that support the creation and use of run-time accessible plug-in serializers that read and write documents in different data formats.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 外掛程式序列化程式僅使用完全信任應用程式。Plug-in serializers can only be used with full trust applications. 當呼叫應用程式時，外掛程式序列化程式會在應用程式相同的執行緒中執行，並只能存取應用程式執行緒內建立的項目。When called by the application, the plug-in serializer runs in the same thread as the application and can only access elements created within the application thread. 當設計自訂外掛程式序列化程式，請務必適當地處理所有可能的錯誤狀況。When designing a custom plug-in serializer, it is important to properly handle all possible error conditions. 外掛程式序列化程式中的任何失敗，可能會導致應用程式失敗。A failure within a plug-in serializer can cause an application to fail.
